SELECT u.username, u.nickname, u.id, u.avatar, u.email, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.delete_time FROM lin_user AS u WHERE u.id IN ( SELECT ug.user_id FROM lin_user_group AS ug WHERE ug.group_id = #{groupId} AND ug.group_id != #{rootGroupId} ) AND u.delete_time IS NULL

SELECT u.username, u.nickname, u.id, u.avatar, u.email, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.delete_time FROM lin_user AS u WHERE u.id IN ( SELECT ug.user_id FROM student_class AS ug WHERE ug.class_id = #{classId} ) AND u.delete_time IS NULL

SELECT u.username, u.nickname, u.id, u.avatar, u.email, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.delete_time FROM lin_user AS u WHERE u.id NOT IN ( SELECT ug.user_id FROM student_class AS ug WHERE ug.class_id = #{classId} ) AND u.delete_time IS NULL

SELECT u.username, u.nickname, u.id, u.avatar, u.email, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.delete_time FROM lin_user AS u WHERE u.id NOT IN ( SELECT ug.user_id FROM student_class AS ug WHERE ug.class_id = #{classId} ) AND u.delete_time IS NULL AND (u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%'))

SELECT u.username, u.nickname, u.id, u.avatar, u.email, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.delete_time FROM lin_user AS u, lin_user_group AS ug WHERE u.id NOT IN ( SELECT tc.user_id FROM teacher_class AS tc WHERE tc.class_id = #{classId} ) AND ug.group_id = 2 AND ug.user_id = u.id AND u.delete_time IS NULL AND (u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%'))
